entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5 except minus 10 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. High minus 5 except minus 10 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 04 March 2023
